list_definition.definition: the part of the body with which one sees
anything like or suggesting an eye, eg the hole in a needle, the loop or ring into which a hook connects etc.
a talent for noticing and judging a particular type of thing

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She has an eye for detail/colour/beauty.
The boys were eyeing the girls at the dance
The old man eyed the group of teenagers warily.

list_ex_of_english: Each drop of rain changes the form; even the wind and the air itself, invisible to our eyes, etches its presence.
